description: Standard card: Death incarnate. No better time to die than now.
name: The Ripper

description: Premium card: You shall not pass, you shall not prevail, you shall perish.
name: Warden

description: Premium card: Nobody suspects an outcast, not even the Gods.
name: The Cursed One

description: Premium card: His presence is not known even by ghosts, success at all costs.
name: Sentinel

description: Standard card: A drink can always be served, with the blood of his enemies.
name: Berserker

description: Standard card: The dragon was unleashed, run for your lives.
name: Firestorm

description: Premium card: Fear him. Your last breath is now.
name: Berserker
